author: Laura Hogan
title: Doubling of clusters in nursing homes since weekend
description: The number of clusters of coronavirus in nursing homes has more than doubled since the weekend to 86.
content:
The number of clusters of coronavirus in nursing homes has more than doubled since the weekend.
Figures released today show there are now 86 nursing home outbreaks, while on Saturday the figure was 40.
The latest data is based on the 5,593 cases of Covid-19… [+886 chars]
